entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:28 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North East Margaree 09:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

Humidity: 97 %

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Snow or rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain or snow this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. Wind becoming southeast 40 gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence late this afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few showers. Temperature rising to 8 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Showers. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence early this evening. Wind becoming south 20 this evening. Temperature rising to 8 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow or rain. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to snow in the morning and ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023
